statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, event_date, shift_start, shift_end FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_id, employee_id, event_date, shift_start, shift_end FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE employee_id = 1002;
SELECT event_id, employee_id, event_date, shift_start, shift_end FROM EmployeeSchedules ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-05-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT event_date, shift_start, shift_end FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE event_date = '2023-01-15'
SELECT employee_id, shift_start, shift_end FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE shift_start > '09:00:00' AND shift_end < '17:00:00'
SELECT employee_id, event_date FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-12-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSchedules WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT * FROM EventSchedules WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventSchedules WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM EventSchedules ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM EventSchedules WHERE event_location LIKE '%hall%';
SELECT * FROM ShiftSchedules WHERE shift_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM EventSchedules WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM EventSchedules WHERE event_location = 'Main Hall';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_duration FROM EventSchedules ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ShiftSchedules WHERE shift_start BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT employee_id, shift_date, shift_start, shift_end FROM ShiftSchedules WHERE shift_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT event_date, event_start_time, event_end_time FROM employee_schedule;
SELECT employee_id, event_date, event_start_time, event_end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM fashion_show_event;
SELECT * FROM store_shift WHERE shift_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM fashion_show_event WHERE event_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT employee_id, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM store_shift WHERE shift_end_time < '18:00:00';
SELECT event_date, event_start_time, event_end_time FROM employee_schedule WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location, event_timeslot FROM fashion_show_event WHERE event_date >= '2022-10-01' AND event_date <= '2022-10-31';
SELECT event_name FROM fashion_show_events WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1234;
SELECT event_location, event_date FROM fashion_show_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Designer';
SELECT schedule_id, employee_id, event_id, shift_id FROM schedule WHERE employee_id = 5678;
SELECT * FROM fashion_show_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM fashion_show_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT s.shift_id, s.shift_date, s.shift_start_time, s.shift_end_time, e.employee_name FROM store_shifts s JOIN employees e ON s.store_id = e.employee_id;

SELECT e.employee_id, e.employee_name, s.shift_date, s.shift_start_time, s.shift_end_time, f.event_name FROM employees e JOIN schedule sc ON e.employee_id = sc.employee_id JOIN store_shifts s ON sc.shift_id = s.shift_id JOIN fashion_show_events f ON sc.event_id = f.event_id WHERE e.employee_role = 'Manager';

SELECT e.employee_name, e.employee_phone, s.shift_start_time, s.shift_end_time, f.event_date, f.event_location FROM employees e JOIN schedule sc ON e.employee_id = sc.employee_id JOIN store_shifts s ON sc.shift_id = s.shift_id JOIN fashion_show_events f ON sc.event_id = f.event_id WHERE e.employee_role = 'Stylist' ORDER BY s.shift_date ASC, f.event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EventSchedule;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT shift_location, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM ShiftSchedule WHERE shift_date = '2022-06-15' ORDER BY shift_start_time ASC;
SELECT event_name, employee_name FROM EventSchedule JOIN EventEmployee ON EventSchedule.event_id = EventEmployee.event_id JOIN Employee ON EventEmployee.employee_id = Employee.employee_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE employee_role = 'Manager' AND phone_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT event_name, employee_name FROM EventSchedule JOIN EventEmployee ON EventSchedule.event_id = EventEmployee.event_id WHERE EventEmployee.employee_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT employee_id, shift_date, shift_location, shift_start_time FROM ShiftSchedule ORDER BY shift_date DESC, shift_start_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name, phone_number FROM Employee WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
